content.hero_title: The TRUTH About IT Right Now
content.hero_subheading: Take the quiz, bust the myths!
content.hero_body: What's really stressing IT teams out at the moment? What misconceptions and outright fibs are being bandied around the industry? Take a look at the following 10 statements and see if you can separate the objective truths from the snake-oil falsehoods...
